instructions: # GURPS Character SheetInspired by way too many roll20 contributors to list them all.Designed for efficiency during play and clean formatting. Text only roll20 sessions compatible (and of course Voice compatible).Includes a GM special tab with a smaller layout for NPC stat blockFor feedback, comments, updates, variable, macro lists and more information, check the [GURP sheet] GURPS Style #2 thread on the Character Sheet forums on roll20.
